ComicInfo.Summary: American Pie: Rick struggles to help Marlo come out of her comatose state and regain her mind. Rick and Betty kiss. Marlo's brothers petition to obtain custody of their sister away from Rick. Cap and Samson get involved but the Hulk steps in to keep them from taking Marlo. As the battle moves away from the house, the police move in and try to arrest Rick but the strain of seeing her husband struggling with the cops snaps Marlo out of her coma.
ComicInfo.Tags: Ray Chandler,The Mount,Doc Samson,Nevada,Betty Ross,Atalanta,Marlo Chandler-Jones,Ajax,Achilles,Pantheon,Hulk,Keith Chandler,Reno,Rick Jones,Elaine Schoenfeld,Captain America
